item.title: GmIT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.05G157300 Gene Symbol: GmIT1 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Ideal type 1 (GmIT1) is caused by a point mutation in the α-tubulin gene that affects microtubule arrangement in soybean.
